name: Hydraulic Press 12 Ton Hydraulic Shop Press H-Frame Garage Floor Adjustable Shop Press with 2 Plates Adjustable Working Table Height, Red
short_description: Robust and Reliable: The H-frame structure provides exceptional strength and stability, allowing it to support substantial loads and ensuring consistent performance during operation.

Efficient Hydraulic Mechanism: Featuring a 12-ton hydraulic jack and dual manganese steel springs, this press delivers consistent pressure with rapid oil return, reducing the effort needed for pressing tasks. It also comes with two detachable plates for securing small components.

User-Friendly Operation: This 12-ton press includes three adjustable holes on each side for height modifications. With high-quality precision springs and a smoothly polished piston punch, it guarantees safe and effortless operation by simply pressing or lifting the long handle.

Multi-Purpose Functionality: Ideal for both professional users and DIY enthusiasts, this hydraulic shop press is perfect for tasks such as disassembling automotive parts, metalworking, bending, straightening, and punching efficiently.

Safety Design: Designed with a built-in safety valve, this hydraulic press ensures safe heavy lifting. The safety valve activates automatically when the pressure exceeds 6 tons, preventing any potential overpressure damage to the workbench.
